sentences.sContent: Early dehydration – no signs or symptoms.
sentences.sCn: 早期脱水——无迹象或无症状。

sentences.sContent: There is no specific treatment for yellow fever, only supportive care to treat dehydration and fever.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is no specific treatment for yellow fever, only supportive care to treat dehydration and fever.
sentences.sCn: 对黄热病没有特效治疗方法，支持性治疗只是治疗脱水和发热。

sentences.sContent: Literally. Tears not only lubricate our eyeballs and eyelids, they also prevent dehydration of our various mucous membranes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Literally. Tears not only lubricate our eyeballs and eyelids, they also prevent dehydration of our various mucous membranes.
sentences.sCn: 从字面上看，泪水不仅润滑我们的眼球和眼睑，还可以防止各种黏膜脱水。

words.tran: 使…脱水；使极其口渴；使丧失力量和兴趣等
